name: forticloud-asset-management
label: FortiCloud Asset Management
description: Asset Management is an easy-to-use portal to register, organize and view all Fortinet products and services in FortiCloud. New products, licenses, or contracts can be registered and managed with the Asset Management portal. Registered products are displayed in the Product List as well as a customizable folder structure called My Assets.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the FortiCloud Asset Management server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the FortiCloud Asset Management server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.name: api_id
fields.title: API ID
fields.description: Specify the API ID is the username for IAM user obtained from FortiCloud Asset Management. It is in UUID format, i.e XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX
fields.tooltip: Specify the API ID is the username for IAM user obtained from FortiCloud Asset Management. It is in UUID format, i.e XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX

fields.name: password
fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the password for IAM user obtained from FortiCloud Asset Management to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the password for IAM user obtained from FortiCloud Asset Management to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.name: client_id
fields.title: Client ID
fields.description: Specify the client ID for FortiCloud site to connect and perform automated operations, i.e assetmanagement
fields.tooltip: Specify the client ID for FortiCloud site to connect and perform automated operations, i.e assetmanagement

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: List Assets
operations.description: Retrieves the list of products from FortiCloud Asset Management based on product serial number or support package expiration date.

parameters.title: Fetch Based On
parameters.description: Specify the option value using which you want to fetch assets retrieved by this operation.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the option value using which you want to fetch assets retrieved by this operation.

Serial Number.name: serial_number
Serial Number.title: Serial Number
Serial Number.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to retrieve products from FortiCloud Asset Management, For example: FGT90D1234567890. Note: * for wildcard search.
Serial Number.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to retrieve products from FortiCloud Asset Management.

Expire Before.name: expire_before
Expire Before.title: Expire Before
Expire Before.description: Specify the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been expire before the specified timestamp.
Expire Before.tooltip: Specify the DateTime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been expire before the specified timestamp.

operations.title: Register Product
operations.description: Register products/contracts in one request in FortiCloud Asset Management based on serial number and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to register product in FortiCloud Asset Management, For example: FGT90D1234567890. Note: * for wildcard search.
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to register product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: contract_number
parameters.title: Contract Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the contract number to register contract with product in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: 2121DJ8902
parameters.description: Specify the contract number to register contract with product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: example: Backup device
parameters.description: Specify the brief product description during registration process based on which you want to register product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the brief product description during registration process based on which you want to register product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: asset_group_ids
parameters.title: Asset Group IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of asset group IDs to register product under certain asset group in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: [6,12,18]
parameters.description: Specify the list of asset group IDs to register product under certain asset group in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: [6,12,18].

parameters.name: replaced_serial_number
parameters.title: Replaced Serial Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number which is used for product RMA registration for replaced product serial number in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the serial number which is used for product RMA registration for replaced product serial number in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: additional_info
parameters.title: Additional Info
parameters.tooltip: Specify the additional information for certain product registration to store in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example system ID, IP address, etc.
parameters.description: Specify the additional information for certain product registration to store in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: cloud_key
parameters.title: Cloud Key
parameters.tooltip: Specify the cloud key to be used in product registration in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: 80X4LSN3
parameters.description: Specify the cloud key to be used in product registration in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: is_government
parameters.title: Is Government
parameters.tooltip: Specifies whether the product will be used for government or not. By default, it set to be False.
parameters.description: Specifies whether the product will be used for government or not. By default, it set to be False.

operations.title: Update Description
operations.description: Updates a description of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management based on the serial number and description you have specified.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to update description of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: FGT90D1234567890.
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to update description of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description based on which you want to update description of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the description based on which you want to update description of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

operations.title: Get Product Details
operations.description: Retrieves the product detailed information, including active support coverage and associated licenses from FortiCloud Asset Management based on the serial number you have specified.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to retrieve product details from FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: FGT90D1234567890.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to retrieve product details from FortiCloud Asset Management.

operations.title: Update Location
operations.description: Updates a location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management based on the serial number and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: FGT90D1234567890
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: address
parameters.title: Address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the address of the location based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the address of the location based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: city
parameters.title: City
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the city based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the city based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: stateOrProvince
parameters.title: State/Province
parameters.tooltip: Specify the state or province name based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the state or province name based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.title: Country
parameters.description: Specify the two letter country code based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the two letter country code based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.title: Postal Code
parameters.description: Specify the zip/postal code of the location based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the zip/postal code of the location based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: company
parameters.title: Company
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the company based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the company based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: email
parameters.title: Email
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: test@testcompany.com
parameters.description: Specify the email address based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.title: Phone
parameters.tooltip: Specify the phone number based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management. Note: Phone must follow this format (without brackets): "+(country code)(space)(number)"
parameters.description: Specify the phone number based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: fax
parameters.title: Fax
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fax number based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management. Note: Fax must follow this format (without brackets): "+(country code)(space)(number)"
parameters.description: Specify the fax number based on which you want to update location of a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

operations.title: Decommission Product
operations.description: Decommission one or more products in FortiCloud Asset Management based on the serial number you have specified.

parameters.name: serial_numbers
parameters.title: Serial Numbers
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of serial numbers based on which you want to decommisse a product in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: ["FGTXXX", "FGTXXX"] or "FGTXXX", "FGTXXX"
parameters.description: Specify the list of serial numbers based on which you want to decommisse a product in FortiCloud Asset Management.

operations.title: Register License
operations.description: Register a license in FortiCloud Asset Management based on the serial number, license registration code, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: license_registration_code
parameters.title: License Registration Code
parameters.description: Specify the license registration code based on which you want to register license in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the license registration code based on which you want to register license in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: K06V2-U795H-9PKR7-2TXNM-V8GL6B

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to register license in FortiCloud Asset Management. Note: If this field is not empty, the license will be registered under it, otherwise a virtual product will be created for the registered license (if applicable).
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to register license in FortiCloud Asset Management. Note: If this field is not empty, the license will be registered under it, otherwise a virtual product will be created for the registered license (if applicable).

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the brief description based on which you want to register license in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the brief description based on which you want to register license in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: additional_info
parameters.title: Additional Info
parameters.tooltip: Specify the additional information for certain license registration to store in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example system ID, IP address, etc.
parameters.description: Specify the additional information for certain license registration to store in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: is_government
parameters.title: Is Government
parameters.tooltip: Specifies whether the product will be used for government or not. By default, it set to be False.
parameters.description: Specifies whether the product will be used for government or not. By default, it set to be False.

operations.title: Download License
operations.description: Downloads a license key file from FortiCloud Asset Management based on the serial number you have specified.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to download license key file from FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: FGT90D1234567890
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to download license key file from FortiCloud Asset Management.

operations.title: Generic API Call
operations.description: Allows querying a generic API endpoint in FortiCloud Asset Management based on the endpoint and method you have specified.

parameters.name: method
parameters.title: Method
parameters.description: Select the HTTP method to be used for the API call. You can choose between POST, GET, PUT, PATCH, or DELETE.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.title: Endpoint
parameters.tooltip: Provide the endpoint for the action, ie /products/list,  /products/register etc. The full list of available actions are accessible from FNDN at https://fndn.fortinet.net/index.php?/fortiapi/55-asset-management-formerly-forticare-registration/2212/55/Product
parameters.description: Provide the endpoint for the action, ie /products/list,  /products/register etc. The full list of available actions are accessible from FNDN at https://fndn.fortinet.net/index.php?/fortiapi/55-asset-management-formerly-forticare-registration/2212/55/Product

parameters.name: payload
parameters.title: Payload
parameters.tooltip: Specify the request payload that you want to send with the API call request. Use empty brackets if there is no payload.
parameters.description: Specify the request payload that you want to send with the API call request. Use empty brackets if there is no payload.

operations.title: Register Service
operations.description: Register a subscription contract (e.g. VM-S) to generate serial number in FortiCloud Asset Management based on the contract number and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: contract_number
parameters.title: Contract Number
parameters.tooltip: Specify the contract number based on which you want to register service in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example: 2121DJ8902
parameters.description: Specify the contract number based on which you want to register service in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: description
parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the brief description based on which you want to register service in FortiCloud Asset Management.
parameters.description: Specify the brief description based on which you want to register service in FortiCloud Asset Management.

parameters.name: additional_info
parameters.title: Additional Info
parameters.tooltip: Specify the additional information for certain service registration to store in FortiCloud Asset Management. For example system ID, IP address, etc.
parameters.description: Specify the additional information for certain service registration to store in FortiCloud Asset Management

parameters.name: is_government
parameters.title: Is Government
parameters.tooltip: Specifies whether the product will be used for government or not. By default, it set to be False.
parameters.description: Specifies whether the product will be used for government or not. By default, it set to be False.
